mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Soloman E. Hylton, Until he turned 21 years of age by 02.26.1892 and Guardianship of Flora Alice Hylton
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Soloman E. Hylton, Until he turned 21 years of age by 02.26.1892 and Guardianship of Flora Alice Hylton John W. Hylton, Guardian Recorded in Ledger Book 4, Page 178 in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
